Module com.apptasticsoftware.lei
Package com.apptasticsoftware.lei

Class LeiLookup

java.lang.Object
com.apptasticsoftware.lei.LeiLookup
public class LeiLookup extends Object
Class for doing Legal Entity Identifier (LEI) lookup.

    • getInstance

      public static LeiLookup getInstance(int cacheSize, int searchMissCacheSize)
      Get instance for doing LEI lookups.
      Parameters:
      cacheSize - - number of LEI to hold in cache
      searchMissCacheSize - - number of search misses to cache to prevent searching for it again
      Returns:
      instance

    • getLeiByLeiCode

      @Deprecated(since="3.1.0", forRemoval=true) public List<Lei> getLeiByLeiCode(String... leiCodes)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      This method is no longer acceptable to get LEI entries

      Use getLeiByLeiCode(Collection) instead.

      Get LEI entries by LEI codes.
      Parameters:
      leiCodes - - Array of LEI codes
      Returns:
      List of LEI codes
